alert.note: Alert for South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 27 at 3:42PM CST until January 29 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...A prolonged period of light to moderate snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Much of Platte and Goshen Counties in southeast Wyoming. Southern Sioux County in the northern Nebraska Panhandle. The highest totals will be found in western Platte County along and west of Interstate 25. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST Saturday. A second wave of snow will be possible on Sunday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions due to icy, snow packed roads and reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
